itunes:title: Hooking Your Reader & Keeping Them Turning Pages - Jeffery Deaver
title: Hooking Your Reader & Keeping Them Turning Pages - Jeffery Deaver
description: In today's Books with Hooks segment, Carly and CeCe discuss falling in love with a story before falling in love with an author; what constitutes a memoir and the different types of non-fiction; giving time frames for your manuscripts; and using the present tense for more immediacy.  After which, Bianca chats with publishing phenomenon, Jeffery Deaver, about hooking your reader and keeping them turning pages; and why books are products with your readers being your customers.
content:encoded: In today's Books with Hooks segment, Carly and CeCe discuss falling in love with a story before falling in love with an author; what constitutes a memoir and the different types of non-fiction; giving time frames for your manuscripts; and using the present tense for more immediacy.  After which, Bianca chats with publishing phenomenon, Jeffery Deaver, about hooking your reader and keeping them turning pages; and why books are products with your readers being your customers.
itunes:author: Bianca Marais, Carly Watters, Cecilia Lyra and Jeffery Deaver
itunes:keywords: Bianca Marais, Carly Watters, Cecilia Lyra, Jeffery Deaver, PS Literary Agency, Books with Hooks, publishing advice, writing advice, memoirs, hooking your reader
